person.persName: Jonathan Belt (Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer and captain 15th KY Cav USA)

body.p: Crittenden County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Tennessee native. Married to Mary P. Wilson Belt in Livingston County, Kentucky, on January 18, 1841. Father of Sarah J. Belt, Harriett C. Belt, James P. Belt, William B. Belt, John M. Belt, Claiborne Belt, Mary R. Belt, Theoderick B. Belt, Martha B. Belt, and Melvina Belt. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1850. Farmer in Crittenden County in 1860. Served in the 15th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as captain from October 6, 1862, to October 29, 1863.
